data.actual_result: The channel name and topic in the text fields are selectable
data.expected_result: The channel name and topic in the text fields are not selectable
data.short_description: Channel name and topic are selectable even when they can't be edited
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permissions to manage webhooks on a channel, but not manage permissions or manage channel - Try to select the text in the channel name or topic fields on Stable - Try the same on Canary - Observe
